TextView.android:text: Sample Diet Chart -> Breakfast: 1 medium-sized boiled potato with 1 teaspoon of low-fat butter. -> Brunch: Salad Lettuce or Kale ,1 bowl of cabbage and a glass of water -> Lunch: 1 onion, 1 cucumber, 1/2 carrot and 2 glasses of water. -> Afternoon Snack : 1/2 cup of sliced capsicum, 1 cup of boiled broccoli or cauliflower and 2 glasses of water. -> Evening Snack: 1 cup of boiled cauliflower and a glass of water. ->Dinner: Mixture of boiled green beans, broccoli, carrot and beet with 2 glasses of water.
